attributes.action: For ITV to remove Kelvin MacKenzie from the This Morning show until he publicly apologises and admits 'the truth' headline in the Sun were lies
attributes.additional_details: I wish the Government to force ITV to suspend Kelvin MacKenzie from all future installments of the 'This Morning' show until such time that he publicly makes a statement both apologising and admitting that 'the truth' headline from the Sun newspaper on the 19th April 1989 were complete lies.
